item.description:
Seeing the NON-3D, though it's the controversial Digital Projection theatre, but, hey, better than 3D.

As above, it's the 6pm showing, so we can still have din-din and not be out too late. Probably snag good seats at Rock Bottom. We'll see. I'll be at the cinema waiting for your smiling faces at 5pm, and we'll head in approx 5:30pm for choice seating. If you arrive late, we'll hang in the hallway outside the theatre for a bit before heading for food, so you can tag along.

Also, opening weekend so GET YOUR TICKETS EARLY!

We'll meet upstairs, at a table near the windows, beside the escalator.

See you there!

 

  • Sam Witwicky (LaBeouf) taking his first tenuous steps into adulthood while remaining a reluctant human ally of Optimus Prime. The film centers around the space race between the U.S.S.R. and the USA, suggesting there was a hidden Transformers role in it all that remains one of the planet's most dangerous secrets. The villain of the third film will be Shockwave.
  • Cast: Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson, John Turturro, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, John Malkovich, Frances McDormand
  • Director: Michael Bay
  • Genres: Sci-Fi ActionAlien FilmActionScience Fiction
item.how_to_find_us: Will most probably be upstairs, so we'll be at a table a'top the escalators. Look for a devastatingly handsome man, with a "Meetup" sign at a table. As usual,
item.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon (NON 3D)
